trans-unit.source: How can I parse a JSON file with PHP
trans-unit.target: 如何用PHP解析一个JSON文件?

trans-unit.source: I am using below code for converting json to array in PHP, If JSON is valid then json_decode() works well, and will return an array, But in case of malformed JSON It will return NULL,
trans-unit.target: 我正在使用下面的代码在 PHP 中将json转换为数组，如果JSON有效，则 json_decode() 可以正常工作，并将返回一个数组，但是如果JSON格式不正确，它将返回 NULL ，

trans-unit.source: I can't believe so many people are posting answers without reading the JSON properly.
trans-unit.target: 真不敢相信有那么多人在没有看懂JSON的情况下,就发布答案。

trans-unit.source: I tried to parse a JSON file using PHP. But I am stuck now.
trans-unit.target: 我试着用PHP解析一个JSON文件。但我现在卡住了。

trans-unit.source: I would appreciate an example for this.
trans-unit.target: 如果能举例说明,我将不胜感激。

trans-unit.source: If in case of malformed JSON, you are expecting only array, then you can use this function,
trans-unit.target: 如果在 JSON 畸形的情况下,你只希望得到数组,那么你可以使用这个函数。

trans-unit.source: If in case of malformed JSON, you want to stop code execution, then you can use this function,
trans-unit.target: 如果在JSON格式化的情况下,你想停止代码的执行,那么你可以使用这个函数。

trans-unit.source: If you foreach iterate $json_a alone, you have an object of objects. Even if you pass in true as the second parameter, you have a two-dimensional array. If you're looping through the first dimension you can't just echo the second dimension like that. So this is wrong:
trans-unit.target: 如果仅让foreach迭代 $json_a ，则有一个object对象。即使您将 true 作为第二个参数传递，您也将拥有一个二维数组。如果您要遍历第一个维度，您将无法像这样回显第二个维度。所以这是错误的：

trans-unit.source: It's completely beyond me that no one pointed out that your begining "tags" are wrong. You're creating an object with {}, while you could create an array with [].
trans-unit.target: 我完全不明白,没有人指出你的开头的 "标签 "是错误的。你是用{}创建一个对象,而你可以用[]创建一个数组。

trans-unit.source: Loop through the JSON with a foreach loop as key-value pairs. Do type-checking to determine if more looping needs to be done.
trans-unit.target: 通过 foreach 循环作为键值对遍历 JSON 。做类型检查以确定是否需要执行更多循环。

trans-unit.source: More standard answer:
trans-unit.target: 比较标准的答案。

trans-unit.source: Output:
trans-unit.target: Output:

trans-unit.source: Remember that the json-file has to be encoded in UTF-8 without BOM. If the file has BOM, then json_decode will return NULL.
trans-unit.target: 请记住,json_decode文件必须是UTF-8编码,没有BOM。如果文件有BOM,那么json_decode将返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: The most elegant solution:
trans-unit.target: 最优雅的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: The quickest way to echo all json values is using loop in loop, the first loop is going to get all the objects and the second one the values...
trans-unit.target: 回应所有json值的最快速的方法是使用循环中的循环,第一个循环将得到所有的对象,第二个循环将得到所有的值。

trans-unit.target: 要遍历多维数组，可以使用RecursiveArrayIterator

trans-unit.source: When you decode a json string, you will get an object. not an array. So the best way to see the structure you are getting, is to make a var_dump of the decode. (this var_dump can help you understand the structure, mainly in complex cases).
trans-unit.target: 当你对一个json字符串进行解码时,你会得到一个对象,而不是一个数组。所以要看清你得到的结构,最好的方法是做一个var_dump来解码。这个var_dump可以帮助你理解结构,主要是在复杂的情况下)。

trans-unit.source: Which gives the result :
trans-unit.target: 其中的结果是:

trans-unit.source: With this change, the json will be parsed as an array instead of an object. And with that array, you can do whatever you want, like loops etc.
trans-unit.target: 有了这个变化,json将被解析为数组而不是对象。有了这个数组,你可以做任何你想要的事情,比如循环等。
